posts.content:
1967 Bug
Â£8000 ono
I am regrettably selling my 1967 lotus white bug to free up funds for a daily driver.

Engine
Very good and strong 1500 single port engine pulls strong, cruises at 65 mph. 22,000 miles on the engine in the last 20 years. Thoroughly serviced and maintained. Oil last replaced Feb 20

Gearbox
Nice and quiet gearbox, short ratios but good cruising speed. No box leaks. New rear mounts installed Sep 19. New Clutch cable Apr 19

Body
Solid underneath, under sealed really solid and dry.

Drive
Drives really well, positive steering, shifting and stopping. All knobs and dials work and feel positive. Handbrake short and positive. Slight added comfort with new coil overs fitted Jun 19

Interior
Really great condition interior in gazelle colour, original headlining, visors and bambu rack sporting good patina but still fully functional

Wheels and Tyres
155R15 Vredetstein Sprint Classic radial tyres all round, good deep tread, all in good shape. Sprint Classic finishing the original stock look. Spare is a full-size wheel wrapped in firestone tyre. Original jack too.

Brakes
Front discs and pads in good condition with fully functional and free callipers, flew through MOT brake test at the start of 2020. Rear drum brakes positive feeling, good overall feel to the brakes, new fluid in Oct 19

Welcome to viewings and close offers, based in Rochdale Manchester U.K.
Thanks
Looks nice, but what price do you have in mind (forum rules say you should include a price) and where in the world are you based?
Okay, I've just seen 'Rochdale' printed on the bin!!!!

Looking for Â£8500 ono
And yeah as my bib suggests Iâ€™m in Rochdale
